title: Puppet Task Metadata
description: The metadata format for Puppet Tasks

description.description: A longer description(one paragraph) of how to use the task

puppet_task_version.description: The version of this spec used

supports_noop.description: This task respects the '_noop' metaparam. If this false or absent the task runner will refuse to run this task if noop is specified.

input_method.description: What input method should be used to pass params to the task

parameters.description: An object mapping valid parameter names to corresponding json-schemas

requirements.description: Features required on target to execute task

implementations.description: Rules for selecting implementation resources based on features available on target

files.description: Path to file resources saved in valid module directory to be provided to task

private.description: Should this task appear by default in UI lists of tasks

paramsObject.description: An object with restricted keys and enumData support

additionalProperties.description: Extend Normal JSON schema to require an object and describe 'enumData' to map enum values to descriptions

type.description: A puppet type string that describes a data type that will match the parameter value

sensitive.description: Whether the task runner should treat the parameter value as sensitive

position.description: The position the parameter should be passed to the script
